p: The cell viability after LH or remdesivir treatment was determined by MTT assay in both Vero E6 and Huh-7 cells. LH showed unapparent cytotoxicity for both cell lines at concentrations up to 600 μg/mL ( Fig. 1 A, C). The positive control remdesivir showed no cytotoxicity to cells at a concentration of 50μM ( Fig. 1B, D).
